extension.name: Membership Renewal Fix
extension.description: Causes certain membership statuses to be unrenewable, resulting in a new membership. **PRRPS NOTE: This extension has been modified by PRRPS to use its customised membership statuses (hard-coded).**
extension.comments: Default renewal behaviour of expired memberships causes them to be renewed with an alteration to start date but no break in membership. This changes that to create a new membership
